The afflicted mans vow with his meditations and prayers. Written by Iohn Mabb, of the Inner temple, Gent: and sometime student there. Mabb, John.
[8], 190 p.
Printed by Thomas Snodham and are to be sould by Iohn Helme at his shop in S. Dunstones Church-yard, London : 1609.
Identified as STC 17156a on UMI microfilm reel 716. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
